verses.roman:
nārado vāmadevo 'triḥ
kṛṣṇo rāmo 'sito 'ruṇiḥ
ahaṁ bṛhaspatiḥ kaṇvo
maitreyaś cyavanādayaḥ

synonyms: nāradaḥ vāmadevaḥ atriḥ—the sages Nārada, Vāmadeva and Atri; kṛṣṇaḥ—Kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyana Vyāsa; rāmaḥ—Lord Paraśurāma; asitaḥ aruṇiḥ—Asita and Aruṇi; aham—I (Śukadeva); bṛhaspatiḥ kaṇvaḥ—Bṛhaspati and Kaṇva; maitreyaḥ—Maitreya; cyavana—Cyavana; ādayaḥ—and others.
translation: Among these sages were Nārada, Vāmadeva, Atri, Kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyana Vyāsa, Paraśurāma, Asita, Aruṇi, myself, Bṛhaspati, Kaṇva, Maitreya and Cyavana.
